# Eagle I.O Selection (2021)

```{r data}

pers <- read.csv("personality.csv", skip=2)
app <- read.csv("Applying+to+Eagle+I.O_March+22,+2021_10.23.csv")

x <- app[1,]
data <- app[-c(1:2),]
colnames(data) <- x

appnum <- nrow(data)

data$Candidate[data[18] == "Catrina Notari"] <- "A"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Pasquale Tosto"] <- "B"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Brooke Steinhour"] <- "C"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Nikita Williams"] <- "D"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Paulina Wiedmann"] <- "E"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Morgan Russell"] <- "F"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Ian Lee"] <- "G"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Isabella Arroyo"] <- "H"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Ryan Lentz"] <- "I"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Amber Ritz"] <- "J"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Ileana Androvich "] <- "K"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Renata"] <- "L"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Dana Sobel"] <- "M"
data$Candidate[data[18] == "Matthew J Giuliano"] <- "N"

pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Catrina Notari"] <- "A"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Pasquale Tosto"] <- "B"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Brooke Steinhour"] <- "C"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Nikita Williams"] <- "D"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Paulina Wiedmann"] <- "E"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Morgan Russell"] <- "F"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Ian Lee"] <- "G"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Isabella Arroyo"] <- "H"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Ryan Lentz"] <- "I"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Amber Ritz"] <- "J"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Ileana Androvich "] <- "K"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Renata"] <- "L"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Dana Sobel"] <- "M"
pers$Candidate[pers[1] == "Matthew J Giuliano"] <- "N"

colnames(data)[21] <- "MSU general events"
colnames(data)[22] <- "MSU I/o events"
colnames(data)[23] <- "Eagle I.O events"
colnames(data)[24] <- "Metro events"
colnames(data)[25] <- "SIOP"
colnames(data)[26] <- "Mentorship events"
colnames(data)[27] <- "Other"
colnames(data)[28] <- "Other description"


```

This is a template for Eagle I.O member selection. As of `r Sys.Date()`, we had `r appnum` applicants with [personality scores](https://ipip.ori.org/30FacetNEO-PI-RItems.htm) as well as [targeted survey responses](https://montclair.co1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_9sKfsFeJQijQ14W).


```{r pers}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)

big5 <- pers[,c(37,1:2,9,16,23,30)]
colnames(big5)[1] <- "Candidate"
colnames(big5)[2] <- "applicant"

big5_long <- gather(big5, factor, score, Extra:Open, factor_key=TRUE)

```

---

# Role-based information (incumbents)

Current members and their expressed interest roles are:

```{r current}

colnames(data)[18] <- "applicant"
colnames(data)[50] <- "Candidate"
colnames(data)[34] <- "Role"
colnames(data)[38] <- "Role1"
colnames(data)[42] <- "Role2"
colnames(data)[46] <- "Role3"

incumbent <- as.data.frame(data[data[33] == "Current member",])
applicant <- as.data.frame(data[data[33] != "Current member",])

yaddup <- kableExtra::kable(incumbent[,c(50,34)])
kableExtra::kable_styling(yaddup, "striped")

```

# Role-based information (applicants)

```{r newbies}

yaddup2 <- kableExtra::kable(applicant[,c(50,38,42,46)])
kableExtra::kable_styling(yaddup2, "striped")

```

## Role coverage (newbies)

```{r roles}

sub <- applicant[,c(50,38,42,46)]

together <- gather(sub, role, noted, Role1:Role3, factor_key=TRUE)

together$noted[together$noted == "The primary role I wish to apply to is event coordinator. "] <- "Event Coordinator"
together$noted[together$noted == "Event coordinator "] <- "Event Coordinator"
together$noted[together$noted == "Alumni Mentorship Coordinator "] <- "Alumni Mentorship Coordinator"
together$noted[together$noted == "Alumni Mentorship coordinator"] <- "Alumni Mentorship Coordinator"
together$noted[together$noted == "R Mentor "] <- "R Mentor"
together$noted[together$noted == "Student Mentorship "] <- "Student Mentorship Coordinator"
together$noted[together$noted == "Student Mentorship Coordinator"] <- "Student Mentorship Coordinator"
together$noted[together$noted == "Student Mentorship Coordinator "] <- "Student Mentorship Coordinator"
together$noted[together$noted == "Social Media & Website coordinator "] <- "Social Media and Website Coordinator"
together$noted[together$noted == "Governance Officer "] <- "Governance Officer "
together$noted[together$noted == "Governance Officer."] <- "Governance Officer "
together$noted[together$noted == "Parliamentarian "] <- "Parliamentarian"

#library(descr)
#freq(together$noted)

## ggplot(together, aes(x=noted)) + geom_histogram(stat="count") + coord_flip()
library(forcats)
ggplot(together, aes(x=fct_infreq(noted))) + geom_histogram(stat="count") + coord_flip()

```

# Roles {.tabset}

The following slides present NEW applicants who indicated an interest within each role. 

## Governance officer


```{r mentor2}

rmentor <- data.frame(big5_long[big5_long$applicant == "Ileana Androvich " | big5_long$applicant == "Matthew J Giuliano" | big5_long$applicant == "Ryan Lentz",])

ggplot(rmentor, aes(x=factor, y=score, group=Candidate)) + geom_line(aes(color=Candidate), size=.9)

library(kableExtra)
a <- kableExtra::kable(applicant[c(7,9,10),c(50,31,32)]) 
kable_styling(a, "striped")

```
